meanings.sent1: The small business was corporatized to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The company corporatized its operations to attract more investors.
meanings.sent3: The local bakery corporatized its structure, now offering franchise opportunities.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative idea was corporatized by the larger company.
meanings.sent5: The concept of teamwork was corporatized to enhance productivity.

meanings.sent1: The new dress code corporatized the office environment.
meanings.sent2: The marketing campaign corporatized the brand image.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was unexpectedly corporatized with team-building activities.
meanings.sent4: His casual attitude was corporatized after joining the corporate world.
meanings.sent5: The traditional recipe was corporatized for mass production.
